thing-type.label: Alarm system
thing-type.description: A virtual thing describing general status of the alarm system.

channel-type.description: Current date and time in the alarm system

channel-type.label: Service mode
channel-type.description: Active when the system is in service mode

channel-type.label: ACU-100 present
channel-type.description: Active when there is an ACU-100 module installed in the system
